channel.title: 718+ NPC Issues
channel.description:
Before I say the problem, I'd like to say that I'm using the Frost Blade source.
The NPCs are bugged. Every time you attack them your account gets messed up and you can't move; you've got to re-log to fix it. The animations and Graphics also don't work and they only do 1 attack style.
EDIT: Found out that it's this way for every source that we've tried, other than Runelove, and it's only like this for us. It's gotta be an issue with our VPS, but I have no idea what it could be. Please help, this is a major issue.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yIsPZrStcYg
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=disLqeh26BA

item.title: 718+ NPC Issues
item.dc:creator: @BarackOBieber BarackOBieber
item.description:
@BarackOBieber wrote:

heatrn11:

Seems like some sort of Anti-leech o: What base is this.

It does this on the Feather, Frost Blade, and NRS3 sources. Strangely enough, I had the NRS3 source from a while ago and it never had that problem. Recently, I started the server back up again and the NPCs are messed up. I don’t know what’s causing it.

Read full topic
